resources.string: "reset\n set terminal png size 1024,768 set output \'networkmonitor-gnuplot.png\' set style data dots set timefmt \"%%Y-%%m-%%d %%H:%%M:%%S\" set xdata time set title \"Network Monitor: %1$s \\\\& %2$s\" set key outside box title \"%2$s\" set datafile sep \'|\' set format x \"%%Y-%%m-%%d\" set ylabel \"%1$s\" set xtics rotate set xrange[\"%3$s\" : \"%4$s\"] plot \\"
\'-\' using 1:2 title \'%s\' with points pointtype 7 pointsize 1
